kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

About this demo site

Mahara is a fully featured web application to build your electronic portfolio. You can create journals, upload files, embed third-party resources from the web and collaborate with other users in groups.

This site runs Mahara 18.04, which was released on 6 April 2018. Please refer to the Mahara user manual to learn more about the Mahara features and how it works.

This demo site will reset itself once a day at 8 p.m. (New Zealand). All content will be erased then and only the pre-configured content will be available.

If you want to keep the personal portfolios you created before the reset, please export them in Leap2A under My Portfolio -> Export to be able to import it into another Mahara later on. You cannot save institution or group settings and content.

Create

Develop your portfolio

Create your electronic portfolio in a flexible personal learning environment
